verses.verse: Then they told <WH5046> David, <WH1732> saying, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> the Philistines <WH6430> are fighting <WH3898> against Keilah, <WH7084> and are plundering <WH8154> the threshing <WH1637> floors. <WH1637>"

So David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of the Lord, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> "Shall I go <WH1980> and attack <WH5221> these <WH428> Philistines <WH6430>?" And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to David, <WH1732> "Go <WH1980> and attack <WH5221> the Philistines, <WH6430> and deliver <WH3467> Keilah. <WH7084>"

But David's men <WH376> said <WH559> to him, "Behold, <WH2009> we are afraid <WH3372> here <WH6311> in Judah. <WH3063> How <WH637> much <WH637> <WH3588> more <WH637> <WH3588> then if <WH3588> we go <WH1980> to Keilah <WH7084> against <WH413> the ranks <WH4634> of the Philistines <WH6430>?"

Then David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of the Lord <WH3068> once <WH3254> <WH5750> more. <WH3254> <WH5750> And the Lord <WH3068> answered <WH6030> him and said, <WH559> "Arise, <WH6965> go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Keilah, <WH7084> for I will give <WH5414> the Philistines <WH6430> into your hand. <WH3027>"

So David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> went <WH1980> to Keilah <WH7084> and fought <WH3898> with the Philistines; <WH6430> and he led <WH5090> away <WH5090> their livestock <WH4735> and struck <WH5221> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter. <WH4347> Thus David <WH1732> delivered <WH3467> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Keilah. <WH7084>

Now it came <WH1961> about, when Abiathar <WH54> the son <WH1121> of Ahimelech <WH288> fled <WH1272> to David <WH1732> at Keilah, <WH7084> [that] he came <WH3381> down <WH3381> [with] an ephod <WH646> in his hand. <WH3027>

When it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> had come <WH935> to Keilah, <WH7084> Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> "God <WH430> has delivered <WH9330> him into my hand, <WH3027> for he shut <WH5462> himself in by entering <WH935> a city <WH5892> with double gates <WH1817> and bars. <WH1280>"
So Saul <WH7586> summoned <WH8085> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> for war, <WH4421> to go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Keilah <WH7084> to besiege <WH6696> David <WH1732> and his men. <WH376>

Now David <WH1732> knew <WH3045> that Saul <WH7586> was plotting <WH9177> evil <WH9567> against <WH5921> him; so he said <WH559> to Abiathar <WH54> the priest, <WH3548> "Bring <WH5066> the ephod <WH646> here. <WH5066>"

Then David <WH1732> said, <WH559> "O Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> Thy servant <WH5650> has heard <WH8085> for certain <WH8085> that Saul <WH7586> is seeking <WH1245> to come <WH935> to Keilah <WH7084> to destroy <WH7843> the city <WH5892> on my account. <WH5668>

"Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> surrender <WH5462> me into his hand <WH3027>? Will Saul <WH7586> come <WH3381> down <WH3381> just <WH9201> as Thy servant <WH5650> has heard <WH8085>? O Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> I pray, <WH4994> tell <WH5046> Thy servant. <WH5650>" And the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "He will come <WH3381> down. <WH3381>"

Then David <WH1732> said, <WH559> "Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> surrender <WH5462> me and my men <WH376> into the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586>?" And the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "They will surrender <WH5462> you."

Then David <WH1732> and his men, <WH376> about six <WH8337> hundred, <WH3967> arose <WH6965> and departed <WH3318> from Keilah, <WH7084> and they went <WH1980> wherever <WH834> they could go. <WH1980> When it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> had escaped <WH4422> from Keilah, <WH7084> he gave <WH2308> up the pursuit. <WH3318>

And David <WH1732> stayed <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> in the strongholds, <WH4679> and remained <WH3427> in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph. <WH2128> And Saul <WH7586> sought <WH1245> him every <WH3605> day, <WH3117> but God <WH430> did not deliver <WH5414> him into his hand. <WH3027>

Now David <WH1732> became <WH7200> aware <WH7200> that Saul <WH7586> had come <WH3318> out to seek <WH1245> his life <WH5315> while David <WH1732> was in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128> at Horesh. <WH2793>
And Jonathan, <WH3083> Saul's son, <WH1121> arose <WH6965> and went <WH1980> to David <WH1732> at Horesh, <WH2793> and encouraged <WH2388> <WH3027> him in God. <WH430>

Thus he said <WH559> to him, "Do not be afraid, <WH3372> because <WH3588> the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586> my father shall not find <WH1> you, and you will be king <WH4672> over <WH4427> Israel <WH5921> and I will be next <WH3478> to you; and Saul <WH4932> my father knows <WH7586> that also. <WH1>"

So the two <WH8147> of them made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the Lord; <WH3068> and David <WH1732> stayed <WH3427> at Horesh <WH2793> while Jonathan <WH3083> went <WH1980> to his house. <WH1004>

Then Ziphites <WH2130> came <WH5927> up to Saul <WH7586> at Gibeah, <WH1390> saying, <WH559> "Is David <WH1732> not hiding <WH5641> with us in the strongholds <WH4679> at Horesh, <WH2793> on the hill <WH1389> of Hachilah, <WH2444> which <WH834> is on the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon <WH3452>?

"Now <WH6258> then, O king, <WH4428> come <WH3381> down <WH3381> according to all <WH3605> the desire <WH185> of your soul <WH5315> to do <WH3381> so; <WH3381> and our part [shall be] to surrender <WH5462> him into the king's hand. <WH3027>"
And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> "May you be blessed <WH1288> of the Lord; <WH3068> for you have had <WH2550> compassion <WH2550> on me.

"Go <WH1980> now, <WH4994> make <WH3559> more <WH5750> sure, <WH3559> and investigate <WH3045> and see <WH7200> his place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> his haunt <WH7272> is, [and] who <WH4310> has seen <WH7200> him there; <WH8033> for I am told <WH559> that he is very <WH6191> cunning. <WH6191>

"So look, <WH7200> and learn <WH3045> about <WH4480> all <WH3605> the hiding <WH9255> places <WH9255> where <WH834> <WH8033> he hides <WH2244> himself, and return <WH7725> to me with certainty, <WH3559> and I will go <WH1980> with you; and it shall come <WH1961> about if <WH518> he is in the land <WH776> that I will search <WH2664> him out among all <WH3605> the thousands <WH505> of Judah. <WH3063>"

Then they arose <WH6965> and went <WH1980> to Ziph <WH2128> before <WH6440> Saul. <WH7586> Now David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> were in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon, <WH4584> in the Arabah <WH6160> to the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon. <WH3452>

When Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH376> went <WH1980> to seek <WH1245> [him], they told <WH5046> David, <WH1732> and he came <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the rock <WH5553> and stayed <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon. <WH4584> And when Saul <WH7586> heard <WH8085> [it], he pursued <WH7291> David <WH1732> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon. <WH4584>

And Saul <WH7586> went <WH1980> on one <WH2088> side <WH6654> of the mountain, <WH2022> and David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> on the other <WH2088> side <WH6654> of the mountain; <WH2022> and David <WH1732> was hurrying <WH2648> to get <WH1980> away <WH1980> from Saul, <WH7586> for Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH376> were surrounding <WH9401> David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> to seize <WH8610> them.
But a messenger <WH4397> came <WH935> to Saul, <WH7586> saying, <WH559> "Hurry <WH4116> and come, <WH1980> for the Philistines <WH6430> have made <WH6584> a raid <WH6584> on the land. <WH776>"

So Saul <WH7586> returned <WH7725> from pursuing <WH7291> David, <WH1732> and went <WH1980> to meet <WH7122> the Philistines; <WH6430> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they called <WH7121> that place <WH4725> the Rock <WH5553> of Escape. <WH4256>
And David <WH1732> went <WH5927> up from there <WH8033> and stayed <WH3427> in the strongholds <WH4679> of Engedi. <WH5872>
